channel.title: ::Yell command staff only

item.title: ::Yell command staff only
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

I am not a java guru but i will try =
Try this:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

            } else {
        if (playerRights >= 0) {
            sendMessage("You must be a staff member to yell.");
        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");

   
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Staff Member] playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: ::Yell command staff only
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

Ok, I have my ::yell set to staff only, and it works. But, I want a message to come up for regular members to say “You must be a staff member to yell.” I tried to do it, but I get error’s.

Here’s my code, what’s wrong?

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (playerRights >= 0) {
            sendMessage("You must be a staff member to yell.");
        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");

   
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Staff Member] playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

Read full topic
